---
name: "Feature request"
about: "Propose a new feature or capability"
title: "[Feature] <short summary>"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: []
---

## Summary

- One or two sentences describing the feature.

## Problem / Motivation

- What problem does this solve? Who benefits?

## Proposed Solution

- Describe the desired behavior, scope, and key requirements.

## Alternatives Considered

- Other approaches you tried or considered.

## Additional Context

- Mockups, examples, links, or references.
- Expected impact and priority.
